mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store(price, amount, name, `type`, image) VALUES (#{store.price},#{store.amount},#{store.name},#{store.type},#{store.image})
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET price=#{store.price}, amount=#{store.amount}, name=#{store.name}, type=#{store.type}, image=#{store.image} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store where (price like #{searchData}) or (name like #{searchData}) or (type like #{searchData});
